overview: Peter Delgrosso serves as Senior Vice President, Business Development of Dun & Bradstreet Credibility Corp., overseeing all elements of the partnership channel and related strategic direction. Prior to Dun & Bradstreet Credibility Corp., Delgrosso served in senior leadership roles running business development, public relations and investor relations for Web.com (NASDAQ: WWWW). Prior to Web.com, Delgrosso served as Vice President, Corporate Communications, managing media relations and investor relations for United Online (NASDAQ: UNTD). Prior to United Online, Delgrosso handled all marketing and communications for Simpli.com, a start-up specializing in search and marketing technology, which was sold to ValueClick (NASDAQ: VCLK). Delgrosso started his career focusing on high-tech PR for Internet start-ups at The Weber Group (Weber Shandwick) and Blanc and Otus. He earned a Bachelor’s Degree in television-radio and a minor in history from Ithaca College. Delgrosso is also an angel investor in numerous companies including MomentFeed and Zeo.
